translations.translation: Ask them: "Which of you is able to vouch for this?"
Ask them: “Which of them can guarantee that?
(Muhammad), ask which of them can guarantee that on the Day of Judgment.
Ask them, who among them is a guarantor for it?
Ask them, which of them will stand as surety for that!
Ask them which of them will vouch for that,
Ask them, which of them will guarantee that!
Ask them (O Muhammad) which of them will vouch for that!
Ask them, which of them will vouch for that!
Ask then, which of them will stand thereof a surety?
Ask them, which of them will aver [any of] that!
Ask thou of them, which of them will stand surety for that!
Ask them, which of them will stand surety for that!
Ask them, which of them will guarantee that!
Ask them, which of them will guarantee that.
Ask them which of them, for that [claim], is responsible.

[68:40] Ask them, which of them will aver, will guarantee for them, that?, [that] decision which they have made for themselves, namely, that they will be given better [reward] than the believers in the Hereafter?
(Ask them) Muhammad (which of them will vouch for that) that they say!

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text: وقوله تعالى: { سَلْهُمْ أَيُّهُم بِذَلِكَ زَعِيمٌ } معناه كَفيلٌ

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: { سَلْهُمْ } يا أكمل الرسل، وفتش عنهم على سبيل التبكيت والإلزام: { أَيُّهُم }  { بِذَلِكَ } الحكم { زَعِيمٌ } [القلم: 40] قائم يستدل عليه ويصححه، أهو؛ أي: الزعيم المستدل واحد منهم؟!
